articles.title: Pelosi to learn if she has enough votes Wednesday
articles.description: The attempt to derail Nancy Pelosi's bid for speaker could be coming to an end. CBS News chief congressional correspondent Nancy Cordes joins CBSN to discuss  the House Democrats' leadership elections.

articles.title: Lion Air flight recorder finds pilots fought to save the plane
articles.description: A flight recorder recovered from an Indonesian jet that crashed last month reveals the pilots battled to save the plane. A new feature that's supposed to increase safety may have played a role. CBS News transportation correspondent Kris Van Cleave reports.

Now, he can watch the sunset with his wife."

articles.title: Tourist clings for life, dangling from flying hang glider
articles.description: A nerve-wracking video shows a tourist clinging for life onto a hang glider in Switzerland. Chris Gursky's harness was not properly attached when he and a pilot launched themselves off a 4,000-foot mountain ledge. It was his first hang gliding flight.
